name: Rebel Rock Retirement Resort
description: The Rebel Rock Retirement Resort project aims to construct a state-of-the-art living facility, where the spirit of rock 'n' roll thrives among seniors. This haven will feature music-themed amenities like a classic diner, a vinyl library, a concert hall, and customized living spaces that resonate with the era of rock. Itâ€™s a place where the music never stops and life is an endless encore.
